类 ANSIConsoleAppender

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.log4j.Appender, org.apache.log4j.spi.OptionHandler

    public class ANSIConsoleAppender
extends org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender
    Colour-coded console appender for Log4J.
